channel.title: CVE Feed for Fortinet -- FortiMail
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Fortinet -- FortiMail

item.title: CVE-2023-36637|2024-09-18T20:28:26.875Z -- fortinet -- fortimail
item.description: An improper neutralization of input during web page generation vulnerability [CWE-79] in FortiMail version 7.2.0 through 7.2.2 and before 7.0.5 allows an authenticated attacker to inject HTML tags in FortiMail's calendar via input fields.
